skillTree.localised_description: The only Dark Pegasus to bear a name is Morathi's personal mount, who carries the Hag Sorceress into the fray.
It is easy to favour Hekarti - who pays close attention to Elven desires - over Atharti, but only the foolish allow that to happen.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +8
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.
All the hate, envy, and malice uttered in prayer each day, returned a thousand-fold.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Sorceresses and Supreme Sorceresses
	(factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Evil takes flight; blotting out the moon on blackened wings, calling us to the dance…

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades Upgraded

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Slowly, gradually, subtly harming all those that block her path.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Khainite Assassins
	(factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: A plan so complex, so labyrinthine, can change even as it comes to fruition.

effects.description:
Assassinate action: Additional 5% success chance
	(all characters)

skillTree.localised_description: The most skilled amongst her possessions are held aloft, that they may burn all the more brightly.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(local armies)

Melee attack: +5 for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(local armies)

Melee defence: +10 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlock and Scourgerunner Chariot units
	(local armies)

Melee defence: +5 for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(local armies)

skillTree.localised_description: Light is driven from the battlefield; numbing darkness rushes to fill the void.

effects.description:
Owning faction's favoured corruption: +5
	(when in own region)

skillTree.localised_description: More than determined, she ensures her nefarious goal is always kept firmly in sight.
Blood, preferably from a still-living 'donor', can enhance and intensify the effects of ceremonial magic.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The grimmer the offering, the more likely it is to attract exactly the right kind of attention.
Always ready to fan the flames of hatred in the Witch King's heart; when he has been betrayed, none have fought so hard to restore his rule.

effects.description:
Attrition: -50% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Every fibre of their being is charged and ready for action - wherever, whenever.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
The Hag Sorceress' allegiance to the Ruinous influence of the Chaos Gods grants her a degree of protection against magical attack.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Power of Darkness"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Doom & Darkness"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Doom & Darkness Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Doom & Darkness Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Soulblight Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.
Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

skillTree.localised_description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

skillTree.localised_description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

skillTree.localised_description: The ability to command the savage, untamed Cold Ones should not be underestimated - not everyone has the knack!

skillTree.localised_description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

skillTree.localised_description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

skillTree.localised_description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

skillTree.localised_description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +12% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I would be so grateful for your cooperation in this, my lord. I do so hate to be... disappointed."

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords in this character's region have a chance to gain 2 loyalty
	(local region)

Slave Cost: -50% for Sacrifice to Hekarti

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

items.colour_text: This enchanted talisman is carved from the heart of the largest black tree in the Petrified Forest.
A powerful item of dark sorcery, this wand unleashes the power of the fell Daemon Kharaidon on command.
